column2: BRIEF-Abdulmohsen Al Hokair signs lease contract with Jabal Omar Development June 11 Abdulmohsen Al Hokair Group for Tourism and Development ~
Sanofi-Regeneron's Praluent cuts cholesterol in Odyssey trials PARIS
column3: June 11 France's Sanofi and partner Regeneron Pharmaceuticals said on Sunday their anti-cholesterol drug Praluent recorded positive results in its first dedicated studies involving patients with diabetes and high cholesterol. ~
